author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
content: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

author: Aristotle
content: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

author: Aesop
content: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.

author: Buddha
content: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
content: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
content: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.

author: Walt Whitman
content: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.

author: Carol Burnett
content: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.

author: Maya Angelou
content: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.

author: Audrey Hepburn
content: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

author: Richard L. Evans
content: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.

author: Vince Lombardi
content: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

author: William Shakespeare
content: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.

author: Unknown
content: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.

author: Milton Berle
content: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.

author: Tony Robbins
content: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.

author: Robin Williams
content: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
content: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.

author: John Muir
content: The power of imagination makes us infinite.

author: Desiderius Erasmus
content: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.

author: Les Brown
content: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

author: Sharon Begley
content: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Buddha
content: What we think, we become.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: Alexander the Great
content: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.

author: Phillips Brooks
content: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.

author: Joseph Campbell
content: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.

author: George Eliot
content: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

author: John Muir
content: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!

author: Jack Dempsey
content: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.

author: W. Clement Stone
content: Prayer is man's greatest power!

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.

author: Vince Lombardi
content: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.

author: Mother Teresa
content: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.

author: Francis of Assisi
content: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows.

author: John Wooden
content: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.

author: Ronald Reagan
content: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.

author: Nido Qubein
content: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

author: Rosa Parks
content: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.

author: Democritus
content: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.

author: Plato
content: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.

author: Augustus Hare
content: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
content: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.

author: Octavia E. Butler
content: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.

author: Lucy Larcom
content: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.

author: Jean de la Bruyere
content: Out of difficulties grow miracles.

author: Thomas A. Edison
content: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.

author: Guru Nanak
content: From its brilliancy everything is illuminated.

author: Nicolaus Copernicus
content: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Each day provides its own gifts.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.

author: Malala Yousafzai
content: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
content: With self-discipline most anything is possible.

author: Thomas Aquinas
content: The things that we love tell us what we are.

author: Nikolai Gogol
content: Countless as the sands of the sea are human passions.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
content: Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.

author: Alan Watts
content: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.

author: Helen Hayes
content: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.

author: Bertrand Russell
content: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
content: The only journey is the one within.

author: Thomas Fuller
content: Great hopes make great men.

author: Robert H. Schuller
content: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?

author: Lao Tzu
content: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.

author: Robert Frost
content: The best way out is always through.

author: Thomas Jefferson
content: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.

author: Tony Robbins
content: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.

author: Bill Copeland
content: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: Nothing is worth more than this day.

author: Hosea Ballou
content: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.

author: Joyce Meyer
content: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.

author: Max Lucado
content: You change your life by changing your heart.

author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
content: Light tomorrow with today!

author: Andre Gide
content: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.

author: Arthur Young
content: God sleeps in the minerals, awakens in plants, walks in animals, and thinks in man.

author: Thomas Paine
content: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.

author: Corita Kent
content: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.

author: Aeschylus
content: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: One today is worth two tomorrows.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
content: Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over.

author: Walt Whitman
content: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.

author: Christopher Morley
content: Act like you expect to get into the end zone.

author: Arthur Balfour
content: Enthusiasm moves the world.

author: Amelia Barr
content: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.

author: Johannes Brahms
content: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.

author: Black Elk
content: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.

author: Anne Frank
content: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

author: Jim Elliot
content: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.

author: Robert Browning
content: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?

author: Plutarch
content: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.

author: William James
content: Belief creates the actual fact.

author: Audre Lorde
content: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.

author: Emily Dickinson
content: I dwell in possibility.

author: Ella Baker
content: Give light and people will find the way.

author: Morihei Ueshiba
content: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.

author: William Allen White
content: I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today!

author: Theodore Roethke
content: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible.

author: Marlee Matlin
content: The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind.

author: John Locke
content: As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears.

author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
content: The authentic self is the soul made visible.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.

author: Christa McAuliffe
content: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.

author: John Maynard Keynes
content: Ideas shape the course of history.

author: Christa McAuliffe
content: Reach for the stars.

author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
content: When deeds speak, words are nothing.

author: Aeschylus
content: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.

author: Morihei Ueshiba
content: Create each day anew.

author: Chrissy Teigen
content: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.

author: Amos Bronson Alcott
content: Our ideals are our better selves.

author: Tommy Douglas
content: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.

author: Bernard Williams
content: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.

author: Charles Kettering
content: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility.

author: Han Suyin
content: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.

author: Michelangelo
content: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.

author: Abraham Joshua Heschel
content: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.

author: Anatole France
content: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.

author: Loretta Young
content: I believe in living today. Not in yesterday, nor in tomorrow.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
content: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.

author: Charles Morgan
content: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.

author: Richard Bach
content: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.

author: Marlee Matlin
content: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.

author: Emile Zola
content: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.

author: Donnie Yen
content: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.

author: Francis Quarles
content: My mind's my kingdom.

author: Walt Whitman
content: We convince by our presence.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: A place for everything, everything in its place.

author: Albert Camus
content: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.

author: Victor Hugo
content: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.

author: Friedrich Schiller
content: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: I love those who yearn for the impossible.

author: Wallace Stevens
content: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.

author: Blaise Pascal
content: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.

author: Pope Paul VI
content: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.

author: Edward Young
content: Too low they build, who build beneath the stars.

author: W. Edwards Deming
content: We are here to make another world.

author: William Morris
content: Not on one strand are all life's jewels strung.

author: Dale Carnegie
content: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
content: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.

author: Pele
content: Sport is something that is very inspirational for young people.

author: Andrew Wyeth
content: It's a moment that I'm after, a fleeting moment, but not a frozen moment.

author: Matthew Prior
content: Hope is but the dream of those who wake.

author: Malala Yousafzai
content: I want to make this world perfect.

author: Malala Yousafzai
content: Benazir Bhutto was an inspirational leader and an inspirational woman.

author: Wallis Simpson
content: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.

author: Zane Grey
content: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.

author: Junipero Serra
content: I pray God may preserve your health and life many years.

author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot
content: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.

author: Friedrich Schiller
content: Mankind is made great or little by its own will.

author: William Ellery Channing
content: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.

author: Aristophanes
content: Let each man exercise the art he knows.

author: Taisen Deshimaru
content: Think with your whole body.

author: Joseph Wood Krutch
content: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.

author: Arlen Specter
content: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.

author: Amy Sedaris
content: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.

author: Cheryl Crawford
content: Lee's great gifts are teaching and inspirational guidance, not administration and management.

author: Phillips Brooks
content: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.

author: Pierce Brosnan
content: I thought 'Moulin Rouge' was inspirational, and 'Jesus Christ Superstar' I loved.

author: Winnie Harlow
content: I've never been a die-hard Beyonce fan. I always thought she was inspirational and beautiful.

author: Peter Diamandis
content: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.

author: Thomas Kinkade
content: I view art as an inspirational tool.

author: Jack Youngblood
content: Deacon Jones has been the most inspirational person in my football career.

author: James Rouse
content: Whatever ought to be, can be.

author: Marcel Wanders
content: The 'Dezeen's of this world are extremely inspirational but have no realistic dimension any more.

author: Andrew Shue
content: I have amazing friends who have led inspirational lives.

author: Om Puri
content: I had hoped when my life was chronicled, it would be an inspirational story.

author: Neil Sedaka
content: The hymn 'Amazing Grace' is so inspirational - I wish I'd written it.

author: Carter Burwell
content: The flow of Guiness into the studio was inspirational as well as nutritive.

author: Linda Johnson Rice
content: 'Ebony' is very inspirational and aspirational to its readers.

author: Taylor Dayne
content: My tastes and inspirational artists were always rather eclectic and diverse.

author: Harvey Weinstein
content: I wanted to do something inspirational for my children.
